abstract: Despite a general slowdown in deal-making, many aerospace and defense bankers are still busy, Investment Dealers’ Digest reports. Large companies in the industry, such as Lockheed Martin and Boeing, are helping to drive the activity as they acquire smaller competitors.
lead_paragraph: Despite a general slowdown in deal-making, many aerospace and defense bankers are still busy, Investment Dealers’ Digest reports. Large companies in the industry, such as Lockheed Martin and Boeing, are helping to drive the activity as they acquire smaller competitors.

headline.main: No Slowdown Seen for Aerospace Deals
